children.description: I received a request from a music blogger who wants to write about the top tracks of a specific artist. To fulfill this request, I will call the "artist_top_tracks_for_shazam" function from the Shazam API. The reason for calling this API with the arguments "limit: 5" and "artist_id: 12345" is to fetch the top 5 tracks of the artist with the ID 12345. By doing this, I can provide the music blogger with the desired information about the artist's top tracks. Additionally, I can recommend similar tracks by other artists based on these fetched tracks.

children.observation: {"error": "Unsubscribed error...", "response": "{'message': 'You are not subscribed to this API.'}"}

function.name: artist_top_tracks_for_shazam
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "shazam", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint will return the top tracks of the artist"

function.name: top_track_by_city_for_shazam
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "shazam", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint will give the top song in specific city"

function.name: top_track_by_country_for_shazam
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "shazam", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint will return the top tracks from a specific country"

function.name: track_recommendations_for_shazam
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "shazam", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint will return the recommendation or similar songs of the given track."

function.name: search_track_for_shazam
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "shazam", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint will search for the name of any song and return similar songs with the name."

function.name: track_info_for_shazam
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "shazam", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint will return info of any track from shazam.com"

function.name: artist_search_for_shazam
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "shazam", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint let you search for an artist by their name. You can get a list of artists from its name."

function.name: artist_info_for_shazam
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "shazam", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint will extract information of any artist from https://www.shazam.com."

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.shazam: Shazam API helps you to recognize any song from a music file, can fetch data from https://www.shazam.com/, extract information related to artist, track or give top songs by country.

I'm a music blogger and I want to write about the top tracks of a specific artist. Can you fetch the top tracks of the artist and provide me with their information? Also, recommend some similar tracks by other artists.
Begin!

By doing this, I can provide the music blogger with the desired information about the artist's top tracks. Additionally, I can recommend similar tracks by other artists based on these fetched tracks.
